Articles.Content:
Nope.

The user below has read "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy".

Yes... though years ago, don't remember much of it.

false

the user below me is reading the 5 book "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" trilogy

False.

The user below me hasn't read the Lord of the Rings, the Hobbit, and the Silmarillion.

True.

The user below has less than 50 posts

False.

The user below me makes addons

Yes.

The user below me uses them.

Yup! I have a separate install for my addons.

User below me is a Pilot of any persuasion.

Nope

The user below me know Tingle

No

The user below me replied my reply to this thread

False

The user below me will fail to understand my logic.

false

the user below me likes finding loopholes in rules

False. I merely enjoy avoiding such a tedious method of evasion.

The user below is powerless.

...depends on your definition... but true... I guess...

the user below me has no idea what my riddle means

true (ples tell??!!..)

The user below me has eaten cake in the last half and hour.

False.

The user below is clueless as to what the significance of 9.21867 is.

Totally clueless...

The next poster will be wishing they were at work

False, i'm in school and don't have a job

The next user is trying to finish their homework

False, I have none.

The next user will read this and then pass out.

True, I will go to bed soon

The user below me really likes hoodies

True, because it's really chilly up here in Scotland!

The user below me lives in a nice, warm place BECAUSE IT'S DAMN FREEZING UP HERE!

That depends. We get near-freezing cold and tarmac-melting heat. It's a bit of everything.

The user below me is male.

True.

The user below me is indeed alive.

False.

The user below me has no conception of the process of resurrection.

False!

The user below me is not a knot.
